settings.text:
All apparel is unisex with a relaxed fit. Measurements are in inches.

Unsure of sizing? Reach out to us at help@pupsentials.com

All apparel is unisex with a relaxed fit. Measurements are in inches.

The denim jacket is slightly oversized while the denim pearl jacket is true to size.

Unsure of sizing? Reach out to us at help@pupsentials.com

When washing your Pupsentials product, turn your item inside out, machine wash cold, and lay flat to dry. Do not iron directly on embroidery. Avoid bleach or high heat to preserve color and stitching.

Because each item is custom-made, orders ship in 3–4 weeks from proof approval. During holiday seasons or with multiple pets, timelines may extend to 5–6 weeks.

We offer a **"Love it or your money back"** policy within 24 hours of placing your order. If your artwork hasn’t been started yet, we’ll refund you in full.

If the artwork has already been created, you’ll receive a refund minus a $35 hand-drawn artwork fee to honor our artist’s time and care.

Because every item is made just for you, we do not accept returns or exchanges after 24 hours unless something arrives damaged or incorrect.

settings.title: MADE by Real Artists
settings.description: All our pieces are 1 of 1 — drawn and stitched by real artists — to showcase the unique bond you have with your pup.

settings.title: Hyper-Detailed Embroidery
settings.description: With over 25,000 stitches and 15+ thread colors, we highlight every expression, marking, and nuance that makes your pup unmistakably yours.

settings.title: Loved by Thousands
settings.description: We pour our heart into every piece to capture your pup’s true essence, offering unlimited revisions until we get it just right.
